overall.description: Return the indices for the lower-triangle of an (n, m) array.

n.description: The row dimension of the arrays for which the returned indices will be valid.

m.description: New in version 1.9.0.  The column dimension of the arrays for which the returned arrays will be valid. By default m is taken equal to n.

inds.description: The indices for the triangle. The returned tuple contains two arrays, each with the indices along one dimension of the array.
